en: Peppa and her family are visiting Uncle Pig and Aunty Pig and Cousin Chloe.
zh: 佩奇与家人去看望猪伯伯，猪伯母和堂姐克洛伊。

en: I expect Uncle Pig will fall asleep after lunch,like he always does.
zh: 我觉得猪伯伯会在吃完午餐后睡着他每次都这样。

en: You shouldn't say such things about your own brother!
zh: 你不该这样说你自己的哥哥！

en: Especially in front of the children.
Uncle Pig always eats too much lunch and falls asleep, snoring loudly! Like this.
zh: 猪伯伯总是午餐吃很多然后睡着了，（并且）打呼噜打得很大声！像这样。

en: forget what I just said about Uncle Pig.
zh: 忘了我刚才讲伯伯的事吧。

en: Peppa and her family have arrived at Uncle Pig and Aunty Pig's house.
zh: 佩奇和她的家人到达了猪伯伯与猪伯母的家。

en: Hello, Aunty Pig and Uncle Pig!
Uncle Pig is Daddy Pig's brother.
zh: 猪伯伯是猪爸爸的大哥。

en: Chloe Pig is Peppa and George's cousin.
zh: 克洛伊是佩奇和乔治的堂姐。
你好啊，佩奇！你好啊，乔治！

en: I want to show you something!
This is my new puppet theater!
My daddy made it for me.

zh: 我已经做了二个木偶了！
你好啊！我是小猪克洛伊。

en: And this one is my daddy.
Chloe? Can me and George make puppets, too?
zh: 克洛伊？我和乔治能不能也做个木偶呢？
克洛伊画了木偶的眼睛。

en: George? What puppet would you like to make?
zh: 乔治？你想做怎样的木偶呢？
你问乔治什么他都会说"恐龙".
好的，一只恐怖的恐龙木偶。

en: Chloe is making George a dinosaur puppet.
zh: 克洛伊在给乔治做恐龙木偶。

en: After lunch, we'll do a puppet show!!
zh: 午餐后，我们来个木偶表演吧！

en: Aunty Pig has made spaghetti for lunch!
zh: 猪伯母给大家做了意大利面做午餐！
这些意大利面很真好吃！

en: You can tell you two are brothers!
zh: 这可以看出来你俩是兄弟！

en: Peppa, George and I are going to do a puppet show!
zh: 佩奇，乔治和我去准备木偶表演！

en: Have I got time for some more spaghetti?
zh: 我还有时间再多吃点意大利面吗？

en: Could I have some more, too?
The puppet show is about to begin!
zh: 木偶表演马上要开始了！
你们好！我的名字叫克洛伊。

en: I think they've made my tummy a bit big.
zh: 我觉得他们把我的肚子做大了一点。

en: Uncle Pig? Are you going to fall asleep and snore like you always do?
zh: 伯伯，你要睡着了吗会打呼噜吗？就像你以前那样。

en: Daddy says you always fall asleep and snore loudly, like this.
zh: 爸爸说你午餐后总会睡着而且打呼声很响，就像这样。

en: You shouldn't have said those things about Uncle Pig!
zh: 你真不该这样说猪伯伯！

en: I don't think Daddy Pig or Uncle Pig can hear you!
zh: 我不觉得猪爸爸和猪伯伯能听见你说的话！

en: Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig have fallen asleep.
zh: 猪爸爸和猪伯伯都睡着了。

en: You can tell they are brothers!
zh: 他们俩果然是亲兄弟啊！

en: Ugh? Has the puppet show started yet?
zh: 呃？木偶表演还没有开始吗？
